getAssignmentSymbols

@Nullable
public static java.util.List<Symbol> getAssignmentSymbols(com.intellij.psi.PsiElement element)
Extracts the assignment symbol from assignment operations, g[x_]:=x^2 should return the g and a = 2 returns a. Note that vector assignments like {a,{b,c}} = {1,{2,3}} return a list of variables.

Parameters:
element - PsiElement of the assignment
Returns:
List of symbols which are assigned.

getSymbolsFromFunctionCallPattern

extractLocalizedVariables

public static java.util.List<Symbol> extractLocalizedVariables(com.intellij.psi.PsiElement element)
This function tries to extract all localized variables inside a Module, Block or With construct. The variables can either be just declared like in Block[{a,b,c},..].

Parameters:
element - The FunctionCall PsiElement containing the scoping construct.
Returns:
List of localized variables. For Module[{a,b:=3,c=2} the list contains the PsiElements for a, b, and c.
